about.title: About Us
about.description: The Taiwan High Performance Computing Education Association is dedicated to promoting HPC technologies and enhancing Taiwan's competitiveness in this field. We provide educational resources, organize seminars, and facilitate industry-academia collaboration.

acalsimPage.title: ACALSim Simulation Platform
acalsimPage.sectionSubtitle: ACALSim (Advanced Computing Architecture Lab Simulator) is a professional simulation platform for research in high-performance computing and integrated circuit (IC) design.
acalsimPage.description: ACALSim (Advanced Computing Architecture Lab Simulator) is a professional simulation platform for research in high-performance computing and integrated circuit (IC) design.

blackbearPage.sectionSubtitle: An open-source project for advancing HPC education and research
blackbearPage.description: BlackBear is an open-source high-performance computing (HPC) project aimed at providing a comprehensive platform for learning and research.
blackbearPage.feature1: Open-source code and transparent development process

educationPage.title: Education & Training
educationPage.sectionSubtitle: We provide innovative educational programs that combine theory and practice to cultivate the next generation of high-performance computing talents.
educationPage.missionDescription: Meeting the shortage of large-scale IC design talents by cultivating professionals with the latest trend concepts and practical tool applications.
educationPage.bridgeGapDescription: Building bridges between industry and academia by introducing the latest industry trends and constructing educational platforms.
educationPage.practicalTrainingTitle: Providing Courses that Combine Theory and Practice
educationPage.practicalTrainingDescription: Using Project-Based Learning (PBL) course design, emphasizing both theory and practice to ensure students master the latest technologies and applications through hands-on experience.
educationPage.pblDescription: We adopt the Project-Based Learning framework to design our courses:
educationPage.feature1: Emphasis on practical work and problem-solving
educationPage.studentSolutionDesc: Research and practical work equally emphasized, developing hands-on talent training programs
educationPage.professionalSolutionDesc: Providing lifelong learning channels to continuously enhance skills
educationPage.academicSolutionDesc: Matching corporate research funding, where companies can call for purposal research with open-source results, benefiting companies without ownership constraints and promoting industry-academia positive cycles
educationPage.industrySolutionDesc: Providing resources and platforms, matching students eager to improve with industry experts. Simultaneously addressing intellectual property concerns through open-source courses and projects
